name: C-LIFE
description:
The plane's engine stops working and now the Pilot is stuck on an island, the Pilot needs to find a way out of the island. There is nothing but a hidden trap door in the middle of the island which will lead to an adventure about sea creatures that are sentient created from an unknown accident.

Note: There's few RPGMaker assets in the game as placeholders, in future builds these placeholders will be changed with original assets.
